A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was bored watching this movie. It never drew me into it's story telling despite it's breakneck pacing & amazing visuals as it never developed despite 2 1/2 hours run time. My biggest frustration was that by the end of the movie i felt as though i do not know what can be accomplished to end this trilogy satisfactorily and make it feel as though i have experienced a true beginning\, middle and end of a journey during this trilogy. Sad to say i do not really think of what could be in the next movie\, and currently would not care if i saw it or not. I just do not care what happens to those people left in the Star Wars universe as they are so 2 dimensional. This series seems so completely disjointed from the events of episode 4-6 that it is more like a movie series set in a similar universe with minor cameos to remind us that it is the same.
